prompt: Generate realistic text messages that represent non-spam (ham) content. These messages should reflect a broad spectrum of everyday communication, including personal conversations, legitimate business or service notifications, casual updates, and automated alerts. Vary the tone (friendly, professional, neutral, concerned), language style (informal chats, formal announcements, concise or detailed), and topics (meeting or appointment reminders, family or friend check-ins, order or delivery confirmations, bank transaction alerts, community or event updates). Include diverse formats like quick one-word replies, detailed explanations, friendly greetings, or automated system messages (e.g., OTP codes, subscription reminders). Ensure the content simulates authentic, non-malicious communication across different contexts, relationships, and platforms, avoiding any deceptive or promotional undertones.
response:
Hey, just wanted to check in and see how you're doing! 

Your appointment is confirmed for Tuesday at 3 PM. Looking forward to seeing you!

Just received your package! Everything looks great, thanks!

Can you send me the notes from yesterday’s meeting?

Reminder: Your subscription will renew tomorrow. Let us know if you wish to make changes.

Hey, are we still on for dinner this weekend?

Your bank account statement is ready to view online. 

Just a quick reminder that the community meeting is on Thursday at 6 PM.

Can you pick up some milk on your way home?

Congrats! Your application has been successfully submitted.

I’m running late, but I’ll be there in 15 minutes!

Your OTP code is 123456. Please enter it to verify your identity.

Looking forward to the concert! Let’s meet at the venue at 7 PM.

I just wanted to remind you about the deadline for the project next week.

How was your weekend? Did you manage to relax a bit?

Thanks for the birthday wishes! It was a great day!

Your order has shipped and is expected to arrive by Friday.

Just checked in with my mom; she’s doing well!

Please let me know if you need any assistance with the report.

I’ll be out of the office tomorrow, but I’ll have my phone if you need me.

Hey, did you see the latest episode of that show? So good!

Your feedback on our service is important to us; please take a moment to complete our survey.

Can we reschedule our meeting? Something came up.

Looking forward to our coffee catch-up next week!

I’m sending over the files you requested. Let me know if you need anything else!

Just a heads up, there’s a chance of rain tomorrow.

Your reservation at the restaurant is confirmed for 8 PM.

Great news! You’ve been selected for the second round of interviews.

Thanks for helping out yesterday; I really appreciate it!

I’ll be out of town from the 14th to the 20th, but I’ll check my emails.

Your utility bill is due soon. Please pay by the end of the month.

Hope you’re having a good day! Let’s chat later.

Just confirming that we’ll start the project on Monday.

I saw your message about the event; sounds interesting!

Your flight has been delayed by an hour. Please check for updates.

Can I borrow your book? I promise to return it next week!

Looking forward to seeing everyone at the family reunion!

Friendly reminder: The payment for your last invoice is due.

I’m here if you need to talk about anything.

Thanks for the update on the project status!

Your password has been successfully changed. 

Don't forget to send me your availability for next week!

You’re invited to the open house this Saturday.

I hope everything is okay; let me know if you need anything.

Your feedback on the new product is valuable to us; please share your thoughts.

I’ll take care of the arrangements for the presentation.

Just checking in to see if you received my last message.

Your delivery is scheduled for tomorrow between 2 PM and 4 PM.

Can you confirm if you’ll be able to join the call?

Hope you’re enjoying your vacation! 

I’ll send you the details for the workshop later today.
